item.title: Weapon attack speeds
item.dc:creator: @bob306 bob306
item.description:
@bob306 wrote:

I was just looking at how 2 change the attack speeds for weapons and found that to change the attack speed u can really only do it for one weapon at a time like below /.

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (ITEM_ID)) { PkingDelay = __; wepdelay = __; resetanim = __; }

but i was thinking if we were to make it like this

if (WeaponName.endsWith("scimitar")) { PkingDelay = __; wepdelay = __; resetanim = __; }

whouldnt that make it set the pkingdelay,wepdelay and resetanim for all scimitars instead of having to add the same thing over and over again for each of the scimitars. also if this is the stupidest thing ever, If its in the wrong place or if someone else has already posted this. im sorry for reposting

Read full topic
